mutants.original_line: valid_switches = [key for key, value in switches.items() if key.startswith("--") and value]
mutants.mutated_line: valid_switches = [key for (key, value) in switches.items() if key.startswith('--') or value]

mutants.original_line: valid_switches = [key for key, value in switches.items() if key.startswith("--") and value]
mutants.mutated_line: valid_switches = [key for (key, value) in switches.items() if key.startswith('') and value]
